New Records: Virat Kohli played one of his best T20 innings for India in the match
Arshdeep Singh removed Babar Azam with his first ball in the T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: India completed a thrilling chase with four wickets down in the final over
Virat Kohli hit two sixes off Mohammad Nawaz in the 19th over to shift momentum
Mohammad Nawaz was the last bowler but could not prevent India from winning
Spin bowlers from both teams struggled as India managed to accumulate runs quickly
Pre-Game Insights: India's batting order was expected to dominate with players like Virat Kohli and Hardik Pandya
Pakistan's bowling attack was strong but India's depth in batting was crucial for the win
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli was emotional after his innings, reflecting on the magnitude of the win
Rohit Sharma praised Virat Kohli's performance as one of India's best
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at the MCG, one of the largest cricket stadiums in the world
The win was significant for India's confidence heading into the tournament
The match was a high-point in Virat Kohli's career
